### Solicitation Description
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites qualified contractors to submit their bids for the provision of General Contractor Services (GCS) at Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge Institution, located in Maple Creek, Saskatchewan.

This Standing Offer is intended to provide ongoing construction, alteration, and urgent repair services as required by CSC. This opportunity is open to all qualified contractors; however, a reserve may be held for Indigenous businesses.

### Key Requirements
- Lowest price will be the selection criterion
- GCS services will be provided at the Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge Institution in Maple Creek, SK
- Contractors must be able to provide all necessary documentation and complete bid submission by the closing date and time

### Contact Information

* Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact: Eric Kwan (eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
